context: I like actress Vivica A. Fox. Could you recommend some movies she stars in?
Sure! Vivica A. Fox stars in Two Can Play That Game, Why Do Fools Fall In Love and The Salon.
Can you tell me what genre is The Salon?
The Salon is a Drama and Comedy. Do you like both genres?
Yes, I do enjoy both drama and comedy. When was this film released?

context.content: Hi there! Do you have a preference for a specific genre or type of book?
I love movies that are full of adrenaline-pumping action, thrilling adventure, futuristic sci-fi, and suspenseful thriller. Do you have any recommendations for me?
context.feelings: I wonder what kind of movies the recommender will suggest. I hope they will be exciting and full of adventure!

context.content: Based on your preferences, I recommend "The Maze Runner" for its adrenaline-pumping action, thrilling adventure, and suspenseful thriller elements.
That sounds interesting! Can you tell me more about "The Maze Runner"? I'd love to know if it has futuristic sci-fi elements as well.
context.feelings: I wonder if "The Maze Runner" has enough futuristic sci-fi elements to meet my preferences. I need to ask for more details about the movie to make sure it's exactly what I'm looking for. The recommender seems knowledgeable, but I want to make sure the movie fits all my preferred genres.

context.content: "The Maze Runner" is a dystopian sci-fi novel set in a post-apocalyptic world. It follows a group of teenagers who are trapped in a mysterious maze with no memory of their past. The story is filled with futuristic sci-fi elements, intense action, and a gripping plot that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Wow, "The Maze Runner" sounds exactly like what I'm looking for! It has adrenaline-pumping action, thrilling adventure, futuristic sci-fi, and suspenseful thriller. I'm definitely going to watch it. Thanks for the recommendation! [END]
context.feelings: I'm excited to learn more about "The Maze Runner"! It sounds like it has all the elements I love - adrenaline-pumping action, thrilling adventure, futuristic sci-fi, and suspenseful thriller. I can't wait to watch it!
